characters: A SHADOW, (WITH A BIRD SKULL HEAD)
OUT OF SIGHT OF THE SCIENTIST,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see an early incarnation of a MACHINE (this will be th inner brain of the FABRICATION MACHINE). We see the scientist, in a white coat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We pull back to see the Scientist is playing a complicate MULTI-LEVEL 3-D chess game on a MULTI-LEVEL GAME BOARD wi the MACHINE. The Scientist makes an elaborate multi-level move. The Machine reaches an arm out into the chess game then malfunctions and strews the game everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We pull back further to see the back and legs of the DICTATOR, with black-uniformed soldiers flanking him. The regime's emblem can be seen on the uniforms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Useless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please.   Give it a chance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're on the machine, which is clicking and jerking as it malfunctions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One more.      That's all. We turns to leave. We hear the clicking of boots as the soldiers accompany him out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see the scientist's dejected face as he comes towards camera to turn it off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The grainy footage rolls again; we see the scientist movi away from the camera (having just turned it on).

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lab is shadowy, late at night. We see his worktable f the first time, covered with discarded sketches, a furiou filled-in journal, and pieces of failed machinery (the fl is also similarly littered). The TALISMAN sits on the worktable. Nearby is a small old-fashioned tiny little bo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (tired, but dictating to keep the documentary record complete) My last possible solution.... (muttering to himself) It must work...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gently brushes his fingers over the little box as thou for good luck. He picks the TALISMAN up off the table. He moves over to insert the talisman into the port of the machine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His back to us, he faces the machine. We see him putting something over his face (but only from behind).

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is a sudden FLASH OF GREEN LIGHT and the machine JO and then suddenly, starts up...lighting up, electricity crackling, parts moving in smooth coordination, etc.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The scientist waits, watching. The machine continues to r Its arms move smoothly, almost curiously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The scientist puts the device covering his face down and up and comes towards camera.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see the camera's POV as the scientist comes towards us CLOSE on the scientist's face, which is exhausted, cheeks sunken, eyes wide, pupils dilated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pull back to show the machine purring, suddenly full of a sort of energy. Something new has happened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The scientist switches off the camera and:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The machine zips through the complex 3-D chess game at lightning speed, checkmating the scientist in seconds as Dictator watches. The scientist laughs fondly and pats the machine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perfect.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (PROUDLY) You see, it evolves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The scientist proudly gives the machine to the dictator. flash goes off: someone is taking a picture O.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The dictator exits; we hear the click of boots and see as much as possible of the soldiers flanking him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE on the machine: the dictator is gripping it with a nasty firmness. The machine seems to try to squirm away. The director's BLACK-GLOVED HAND grasps it harder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: he machine, responding to the brutality, lashes an arm ou and grabs the nearest soldier (seen from the back, we see only the uniform and helmeted head) by the back of his ar BREAKING his ARM. The soldier falls (if possible).

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: he dictator CONTINUES ON WITHOUT BREAKING STRIDE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHILLINGLY) Yes. Perfect.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And we:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SEQ. 010 - Title Sequence

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (robotic sounding) Alert. We are in a state of emergency...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sounds of WAR: EXPLOSIONS, MACHINE GUNS, SCREAMS...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A tiny, cluttered attic, filled with bits and pieces of f material--burlap, door hinges, an old shoe, old eyeglasse rusty scissors, pen nibs, gas masks etc.   We see the tin little box sitting on the cluttered makeshift worktable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...the Machines have become uncontrollable... they are shooting at will... ALERT: stay in your homes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grainy footage as we see the scientist looking around desperately--he's obviously in hiding.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (HEARTBROKEN) My invention... my beauty... beauty was taken...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is feverishly cobbling together a SMALL BURLAP DOLL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He labels the burlap doll on its back: "1." He makes fran notes in a journal. He brushes his fingers over the littl box for good luck, then moves towards a strange contrapti on the table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LASHES and EXPLOSIONS shake the workshop horribly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reports are coming in... they've breached the Northern walls of the city...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The radio voice is DROWNED OUT BY EXPLOSIONS. D

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An announcement from our Chancellor!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (on the radio) Comrades, I have lost control. The Machine is now our enemy. We need to join forces to fight against it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear EXPLOSIONS and SCREAMS outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see the scientist cobbling together another SMALL BURL DOLL, a little more evolved.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He labels it "5," then makes notes in a journal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: his voice a mere whisper NOW) Five so far....I can't get them right...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (through static) Gas masks are being distributed... ALERT: beware....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see the scientist desperately grabbing bits and scraps one last doll. He is like a skeleton, almost no energy le

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADIO (V.O.) (cont'd) ...deadly gas....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: he radio voice dies out.   We hear nothing but STATIC.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The scientist totters over, makes a note in his journal. clutches the little box, and suspends this last doll with rope in a strange contraption.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: a feeble whisper) My last one... this one, finally, must work... it must....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SOUND of the scientist collapsing to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SEQ. 020 - Attic

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The thin strand of rope stretches... stretches... and

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The rope SNAPS, and--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --a SMALL BURLAP FIGURE falls onto the table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As he falls, he is yanked free from a large, circular Machine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: e had been attached with the fraying rope and a long cabl attached to him by the TALISMAN. The cable still dangles from the Machine, but the force of his fall pulls the Talisman off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The little burlap figure pulls himself to his feet, shaki his head. Falling free from the connecting cable has fina awakened him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: e is made up of odd patchwork items: burlap, a thick zipp big round gas-mask eyes (which we recognize as what we sa before, in the title sequence).

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We pull around to see the number "9" painted on his back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We pull back further to see...
..he is on the tabletop in the RUINS OF A SMALL ROOM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Splintered BITS OF WALL jut up to the open sky. Rotted FLOORBOARDS are BENT and WARPED. The room is full of year of DUST and ROT. Dust hangs in the feeble rays of dirty sunlight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The table and floor are covered with the same kinds of sc and raw materials from which "9" is made: burlap, hinges, bits of Machinery.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9" blinks and turns around, his head darting this way and that, trying to make sense of his surroundings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He walks over to the edge of the tabletop. He peers over, sees...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...the SCIENTIST LYING DEAD ON THE FLOOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: lumped on the floor, we clearly see: the scientist's skeletal hand is clutching a tiny box.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hears a clattering sound and turns to see

dialogues.speaker: A
dialogues.text: loose window shutter. He goes over to the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: e pushes opens the window to see--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: usting machine carcasses, bombed-out ruins, and emptiness stretch as far as he can see.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Terrible, life-ending destruction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: here is no other living being anywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 stares in disbelief and horror and fear. He can't make sense of it... or the room... or the endless miles of lifeless wasteland stretching out in front of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: e seems to be completely alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: sees a glint of something, a possible sign of life.    He moves to go outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stops and is strangely drawn to the TALISMAN. He turns and takes it, stowing it inside his zippered chest before heads out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SEQ. 029 - 9 Meets 2

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 moves warily in the dusty, grim light, along the desert RUINS of the outside streets. It is the remains of war.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pulverized HULKS of BUILDINGS, torn-open suitcases, scatt clothes, rusting cars and the grim debris of human civilization surround him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sees a dead body slouched next to a suitcase in the fr seat of a car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Banners hang on the buildings with a three prong symbol o them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: achines lie deserted on the sides of roads.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Distracted by the spectacle, 9 stumbles and lands on a ra old flyer: REVOLT!    He looks back at the War Machines a Dictator flags.    He sees a vandalized poster of what ap to be a dictator/leader.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 looks around him, trying to piece together what happene Suddenly there is a clanking sound in front of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 sees a light flicker on in the shattered hulk of a war Machine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LOSE on 9 as the light crosses his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scared, he ducks behind a huge piece of debris.   9 grabs piece of metal lying in front of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The shadow moves closer, 9 shakes nervously. The figure emerges with spear in hand and 9 swings the weapon at him with all his might.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 hits him square in the chest. It is another ragdoll: 2. is propelled backwards and falls to the ground on the deb behind him. 9 quickly tries to hide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But 2 is looking at 9 with surprise.   He struggles to ge 2

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: speaking with urgency to 9.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (firmly, kindly, almost eagerly; like trying to soothe a wild animal) Wait... I am a friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (GENTLY) Friend... I am a friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 now sees he has hit a ragdoll, similar to himself. He hesitates, not sure what to make of this. 2 extends his hand, calmly, eagerly. 9 hesitates again, then, still tim but showing a little bravery, drops his weapon and goes t help 2 up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see that 2 is much older, much more decrepit, much mor primitively constructed: he is made from patchwork bits o OLD LEATHER SHOES. A SHOELACE stitches up his front and i tied in a bow at his neck. Bits of leather FRAY off him. His feet are primitive small HINGES. Half of a pair of eyeglasses, like an enormous MONOCLE, is attached to 2's

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 helps straighten 2's monocle. 2 smiles at him. We see that 2 is like a wise mentor, a kindly professor with a contagious eagerness and imaginativeness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 peers eagerly at 9.   He circles 9 and spots the number his back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (eagerly, excited, like an intrigued scholar) Yes... yes... I always thought there'd be one more.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He nods and smiles. He extends his hand to shake 9's hand While doing this, he takes 9's hand and studies it, noddi with eager excitement. We see that 9's hand is more sophisticated than 2's.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The details... how exciting. (FASCINATED) Carved wood... steel bolts... molded copper...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 turns slightly, and 9 sees his number and tries to say But no sound comes out of his mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: looks at him, nodding, again, the kind mentor. He's interested, observing without judging; curious, kindly an ready to help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't speak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With a friendly, disarming smile, he taps 9's zipper. 9 unzips himself and 2 peers in. 2 looks up, happy that he help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, yes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 looks around nervously and hurries over to his roller-s cart covered with detritus - odds and ends, a broken chin doll.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...come with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: follows, looking around curiously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 finds the china doll.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As 2 rummages through the chest of the china doll 9 picks a bullet casing from 2's cart and starts tapping it. 2 tu with the doll's voice box in his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sees 9 with the bullet; whispers sharply) No! Stop!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 eases the bullet away from 9, then smiles gently at 9,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ( QUIETLY) Some things in this world are better left where they lie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: e puts the bullet to one side and kneels, prying into 9's chest. 2 begins to connect the doll's voice box.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But if you know where to look, these ruins are full of riches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 concentrates, a look of pleasure on his face as he twis few more wires. Static and unclear sound come out at firs but as 2 tunes the voice further...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 (as his voice is "tuned in".. starting with pure static, then slowly moving into a voice) Chhhhhhh.....chhhhehhhh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 Wait.. (tunes him in) ...almost there...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 gets a little panicky look on his face at the strange sounds coming out of him. 2 puts a calm hand on his shoulder. 9 calms down and tries again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 Friend?   Friend?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 (BEAMING) Friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 (more and more normal SOUNDING) Are we alone?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 (REASSURING) No. There are others.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: and 2 stare at each other. 9 looks at 2 in wonderment, then reaches out and touches 2's chest where he hit it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 beams at 9, happy 9 can speak, happy he was able to hel and happy that 9, with his first words, is concerned abou others.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: glow beams from within 9's chest.   2 stares.   9 removes TALISMAN from his chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 has a big reaction--he draws his breath in and looks at in ASTONISHMENT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He takes it and looks at it.     He gives 9 a look of sur

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But how strange.... muttering to himself as he turns the Talisman in his hands) Yes, he was always drawing this... exactly like this... how strange...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: hey both stare at the TALISMAN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, a  is heard OFFSCREEN. 2 looks up IN HORROR. He grabs his spear. He pushes 9 away almost fiercely.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (firmly, to 9) GO!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SEQ. 030 - Cat Beast Attacks

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 points forcefully to an old rusted can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 runs into the can. stands, ready to attack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 watches 2, wondering what is coming. Then from behind h a large claw of a mechanical figure settles softly next t 9's can. He tries to call out to 2...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And from behind 2 enters--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: t is a nail and razor-studded predatory Machine with a ca skull-shaped head, its body laced with bones, nails and razors. 9 now understands 2 was trying to protect him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GASPS as he turns and sees it. The Cat Beast lets out a roar and claws at 2, KNOCKING him over and losing his spe

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: looks on with horror.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 attempts to reach for his spear but the Beast holds him down with its razor-sharp feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Beast is attracted to the Talisman. It picks it up wi one of its jagged claws and looks at it quizzically.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: cringes.    His movement makes his hiding place teeter, creaking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: he Cat Beast WHIRLS at the sound. Picking up 2's struggli body, the Cat Beast stalks towards the noise, right up to hiding place, sniffing through its hollow nostrils. 9 cringes in terror. The Cat Beast probes with one of his claws INTO the tin can. 9 recoils. The claws do not find him and retreat. 9 is relieved.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beat, then:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 feels himself violently LIFTED UP and SMASHED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see the Cat Beast has picked up the entire tin can and smashing it to get at what's inside it.   Failing, it hur the tin can aside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 is almost knocked out. Trying to stay conscious, he struggles towards the entrance of the can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: is POV: through his haze and through the broken edges of opening to the can, he sees the Cat Beast GRAB the Talism and the struggling 2 in his sharp-toothed mouth, and disappearing into the smoky mist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 can just make out, in the distance, the silhouettes of

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (MUTTERING) The others...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: POV SPYGLASS: the spyglass searches through the city and comes across a lone staggering figure (9).

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: W

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pull back to show the back of 5's head as he peers throug the spyglass, then pulls away so we can see into the spyg again.   We zoom in through the spyglass to a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE SHOT on 9--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 staggers, weary, and collapses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the foreground, the feet of another ragdoll (5) step i the shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seq. 040 - Meeting 5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 is finishing sewing 9 up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's all right. You're safe now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 Where am I?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 With us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (MUTTERING) Yes... he told me there were others...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 (suddenly, urgently) Who?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (still dazed, trying to REMEMBER) He was older... Out there...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 2.  Out in the emptiness? HORRIFIED) Alone? Was he all right? hen is he coming back?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ( T

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 looks at him, the whole memory suddenly coming back to as though fresh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HE--THE-- can't think of the right

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: T hing! It took him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 reacts with horror.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 No...   No!       It can't be!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns away, grief-stricken.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keeping secrets from me, I see.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another RAGDOLL pushes into the workroom. This is a bigge ragdoll, the most primitive one we have seen. He has primitive wooden hinges for feet. He is very frayed and patched together. The number 1 is painted on his back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: and 9 whirl around.       5 CRINGES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 I... I was coming to tell you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 carries himself with authority. He wears a red cloak, a a strange mother of pearl and wire hat bound together as almost papal-like headpiece, and carries a staff made fro old gear, with a bell attached.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: pulls at 9 with his staff, displaying the number on his back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 hat's this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: turns and glares at 5 like a general glaring at a new private, expecting an explanation for a misdeed. 5 cringe back, obviously intimidated by 1.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 ... I found him.... in the emptiness.   He saw--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 HOOKS 5 by the neck with his staff, cutting off his spe

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 What? What were you doing out there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Y

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 I saw him from the watchtower and I thought...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ou'll lead The Beast straight back to us! How many times have I told you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Beast--that's what took 2!   If we hurry we could save him--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 (CURTLY) If the Beast took him, that's the end of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 But he was still alive--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 turns with sudden hope to 9.   2 might still be alive?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 No, we have RULES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 smashes his staff against the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Immediately, a knife comes through the curtain revealing another RAGDOLL: a large ragdoll, with the number "8" on arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (TO 8) Our new guest seems confused. (condescendingly, to 9) Perhaps I can help you achieve some clarity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 8 is very large, and designed for great strength. He is almost as evolved in his design as 9, but his design favo primarily brute force.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He has armored himself with curved pieces of tin and meta He carries the blade of a large kitchen knife, with a nai has attached for a handle. On his back he has slung anoth knife--half of a scissors; the scissors handle loops up a his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 leaves. 8 taps his knife in his hand and motions for 9 5 to follow.  They follow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SEQ. 050 - Clock Tower

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They walk through the nave and plane up overhead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 taps 9 covertly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 (whispering, hopefully) He was still alive? Really?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 I think so--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 8 looms forward threateningly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 8 Hmmmph!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 quickly stops talking.   9, following his lead, stops talking also.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The group gets into a bucket-like device.   8 pushes 9 ha into the bucket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NODS commandingly to 8. 8 begins to crank a rope that lifts them up. 5 gestures to 9 to hold on. 9 braces himself as 8 pulls them up into a tall tower. He steals a glance at 1. 1 frowns. 9 tries to smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: hey pass an old plane outside that has crash-landed in to the Cathedral.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the side wall is a round, multi-colored stained glass window. Shafts of different colored sunlight flicker through.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: he bucket moves past two large church bells into--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...the inside of a CLOCK TOWER of a once-magnificent Cathedral. We see the BACK of the CLOCK, the light castin shadows of the backward numbers onto the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 gestures out towards the outside and addresses 9:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When we woke in this world....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Camera drifts up to the clock... WIPE to WHITE...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SEQ. 053 - War Flashback

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ENTER FLASHBACK:  as we see the chaotic inferno of war.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (V.O.) (cont'd) ...it was chaos... Man and Machine attacked each other with fire and metal... The earth split and the skies burned...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ragdolls 2, 5, 6, 8, and 1 hide under an old helmet, frantically trying to escape the explosions BURSTING arou them. 7 appears with 3 and 4. We get the sense that 7 is the reckless one, the only one determined to SCOUT AROUND see what's out there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (TO 1) I found others...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are welcomed in by the other dolls. They turn to 1, is clearly the leader, to see what to do next. 1 decides: points forward, and they all run a few feet while underne the helmet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A plane crashes in the background, causing 5 to fall behi (he has both eyes).

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: hrough a dirty MIST we see War Machines enter with their weapons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A RESISTANCE FIGHTER throws a Molotov cocktail at one of Machines. It turns and SHOOTS a round of gunfire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A MUSTARD GAS BOMB is launched from the top of the Machin It heads straight at 5 but he runs and gets KNOCKED to th ground, barely missing it.

dialogues.speaker: T
dialogues.text: he bomb lets out a yellow CLOUD that envelops the area an KILLS PLANTS ON CONTACT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 7 turns and sees 5 lying face-down on the ground.   1 urg her to stay with the others.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But, again, brave and slightly reckless, she runs through yellow cloud to help him. She brings him back to the grou His left eye is damaged. The others cower. 2, the gentle mentor of the group, puts a comforting hand on 5's damage eye. 7, always the scout, brave and fearless, points off the right, and addresses 1.   She knows what's out there; she's seen it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (TO 1) There's a path ahead--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 looks around calculatingly, like Patton: the general ta charge. He thinks, judiciously, then:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 (TO 7) Go ahead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: nods and darts off.      1 turns to the others, who wait their instructions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the others) Follow me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They hurry off, increasingly enveloped by the YELLOW CLOU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The yellow CLOUD TRANSITIONS into STEAM...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (V.O.) (cont'd) The gas killed everything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SEQ. 057 - 9 Meets 6

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The steam is rising from the small thurible in the CLOCK TOWER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I led us here...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 is now standing at the thurible with a torch in his han

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 (V.O.) (cont'd) ...to sanctuary. And here we waited for the war to end.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: T

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He puts his hand around 9's shoulders and walks him over the other side of the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slowly, the world became silent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 and 9 walk over to a picture of the Cat Beast hanging o the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The only thing that remains now is the Beast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 faces 9 as the torch slowly fades.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So we stay hidden and we wait for it, too, to sleep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: he torch burns out. 9 looks at 1.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But where did it come from?   Why is it hunting us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 Questions like that are pointless. We need to protect ourselves. Keep ourselves out of danger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But one of us is in trouble... he could still be rescued...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 turns and walks to a tattered calendar page on the wall with the days 3, 4, and 7 crossed off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 oo many of us have already been lost.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 crosses 2's number off the calendar with the burnt end his torch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! You're not listening. He may still be alive! Why won't you try to save him? Why won't you--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 angrily SMACKS HIS STAFF ON THE FLOOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 Enough! Enough of this madness! (to 5, annoyed) Go to the watch tower and take our guest with you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 meekly immediately obeys, gesturing to 9 to follow him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear a strange WHISPERING SOUND, and CAMERA, instead o following 5 and 9, stays behind and moves in on a shadowy little area. There, we see 6. 6 is ink-stained and has a strange quality, as though he sees and hears things insid his head that only he experiences. He has a SMALL SKELETO KEY around his neck, and his fingers are made of PEN NIBS He is drawing on a piece of paper and WHISPERING TO HIMSE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 6 muttering, whispering) The source.... The source...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see he is drawing the TALISMAN. In fact his whole area covered with drawings of the TALISMAN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SEQ. 060 - Telescope

dialogues.speaker: THE CATHEDRAL
dialogues.text: rom a high angle we see the nave of the Cathedral. It has been bombed and attacked, and there is a plane intersecti through the side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Camera moves to the left and what seems like a prow o boat comes into frame. We find ourselves in...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 had created a sort of LOOKOUT. A rickety, jury-rigged spyglass points out of a hole in the wall. A half-drawn m is pinned up next to the spyglass. Everything is pieced together from the sorts of bits and pieces we saw 2 scavenging. Around the space, we also see more bits and pieces that 2 has found out in the wilderness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: sighs sadly.       He touches the spyglass sadly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 This was the first thing we built together. looking around at the map, bits and pieces, etc.) All his work... trying to make sense of everything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks out into the wilderness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is he out there? Is he still alive?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 Yes.       He could be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: looks out in fear. We see the conflict on his face: fear of going out there but a desperate longing to see his old friend again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (conspiratorially; looking around to make sure they're not being spied ON) We could go after him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shocked; and amazed, this is impossible) Us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one else will. imploring him) We MUST go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 is silent, afraid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 looks through the spyglass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: POV spyglass: the THREE TALL SHAPES in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look. That's where the creature took him. Out towards those three tall shapes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 (HORRIFIED) Ohhhh... no... we can't... not there. We need to stay here. (as though repeating something he's heard from 1) We have rules.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: looks at him.    He recognizes 1's words.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: QUIETLY) Why do you listen to 1?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 looks at 9.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (repeating what he's been indoctrinated with) A group must have a leader.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 looks at him for a beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 (GENTLY) But what if the leader is wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 looks a little shocked. He never thought of this. We se in 5's face that he is considering 9's question, but he s can't bring himself to disobey 1.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 hesitates again.      9 sees he is having an effect on

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (suddenly, firmly) I'm going. I'm going to look for him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to 5.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (COAXING) Come with me. I can't do it alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: is terribly torn. He wants to, but he's never done anything like this before. He's always done as he's told. He hesitates:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 (HESITATING) I... I...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (he can't odo 'd) he can't 5(c nt it, DEFY 1) I can't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 looks directly into his eyes. He knows how 5 loved and admired his mentor and everything he did. He understands that 5 would like to be like 2, to do what 2 would have d

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (GENTLY) But wouldn't he have come for you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 waits, hopefully. But 5 looks away. He wants to do it, but he doesn't have the nerve. 9 nods, compassionately. H turns away. 5 hesitates, looking down, then:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 (more determined) Wait!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 grabs the map off the wall and rolls it up.   He walks towards 9.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're going to need a map.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 and 5 smile at each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SEQ. 070 - Wasteland

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 and 5 look behind them at the Cathedral as they start t make their journey to find 2.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 and 9 pick their way through the rubble. They have traveled miles from the Cathedral. Mist swirls in front o them, obscuring their path. 5 and 9 look around constantly, on the alert for the Cat Beast. Piles of rusted, broken metal machines, broken skeletal bones, exploded vehicles tipped into craters, an crumbling, disintegrating buildings surround them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 looks up and 5 follows his gaze to 2's STAFF stuck in a pile of rubble atop a hill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 hurries up the hill. 9 follows him. 5 turns to FIND 2's hat lying in the dirt. He bends down to pick it up, brush the dust off the top. 5 looks sadly at 2's broken hat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (QUIETLY) You looked out for him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 (SIMPLY) He looked out for me.    He taught me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: he spoon-light falls off.      5's face is filled with gr

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why was he out here alone?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He slumps.    9 puts his hand on 5's shoulder, reassuring

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 We can still find him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: e stands up, determinedly. 5 hesitates, but then, his fac filling with hope, gets up too. 5 puts 2's hat on his quiver. 9 offers 2's staff to 5 but 5 gestures to 9 for h to hold it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They continue on, through the debris and devastation. storm is starting to come up. The wind howls loudly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 (BITTERLY) Why was he out here alone?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A good question.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (RUEFULLY) Yes. The ones we're not supposed to ask.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They exchange a look. This is the first time 5 has said something to actually challenge 1's rules. 9 notices this and nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: W

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The wind howls louder. 5 looks at his map uncertainly and tries to keep leading them forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They come to a field full of trip mines and dangerous tan trap pits.   A parachute blows in the wind on a tree bran

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 turns the map one way and the other with growing panic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 here are we?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 (MISERABLY) I don't know...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As he turns the map to look at it, the wind picks up and blows the map out of 5's hands. It blows away into the distance and gets stuck on a pole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 reaches after it desperately but can't retrieve it. looks in despair at 9.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's no use.      We should go back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 looks around bravely, then points over towards a trench

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They head over to the trench.      They now see a huge FO OF THE BEAST.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They inspect the footprints. 9 moves bravely towards the trench entrance. 5 resists, afraid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No... it's too dark.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 looks around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 We can use that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: e points to a lightbulb in a broken headlight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SEQ. 075 - Trench

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 is pointing to the lightbulb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: can't help himself. He pulls the lightbulb out, pulls out a battery and electrical wire from his chest, winds the w around the battery and places it inside the hat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They screw the lightbulb and it LIGHTS UP.    5 can't hel 9 smiling at 9.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: unwinds the wire holding the blade on 2's staff. He place 2's hat on the end of 2's staff and secures it with the blade.   5 nods, intrigued.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 Yes... yes... good....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sees that 9 now has made a LIGHTSTAFF.    He blurts ou

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 will be so impressed!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A terrible grief suddenly comes over him as he remembers has happened to 2.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: puts his hand on 5's shoulder, bracing him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 (FIRMLY) Yes. He will.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 is conveying with his simple words that he believes 2 I still alive and he WILL be impressed when he sees the lightstaff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 shines the light to gesture "this way."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 smiles tremulously at 9, almost more grateful for his sympathy and support than necessarily believing him. He follows 9 to the mouth of the trench.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The camera pans over to reveal catlike scratchmarks on a wall indicating this is the same trench we saw the Cat Be travel through earlier.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 recoils, but 9 puts a calming hand on him again, then p both hands on the lightstaff and enters the trench. 5 tak a deep breath and follows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 and 5 continue down the trench, both looking around wit great caution and nervousness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: s they come around a corner they see--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CAT BEAST.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 springs into action shooting his weapon at the Beast. shines his light up to see... an old hanging gas mask.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: hey look at each other and LAUGH as they continue down th trench.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 AND 5 (cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The mask DROPS behind them and they SCREAM and run away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 AND 5 (cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someone is watching them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 and 9 climb up a hill of sand bags..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They come around a corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 (DISCOURAGED) We've been here before... it's no use.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: steps over and pushes some debris aside.    Suddenly they see they are right next to....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SEQ. 080 - The Factory

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The FACTORY: A enormous, destroyed old stone building, it caved-in ceiling revealing huge boilers, scarred old meta walkways and catwalks dangling, dust-covered rotting turb exposed to the elements.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They creep into the enormous hulk of a building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the center of the building are the splintered vestiges an enormous

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Enormous metal arms lie motionless. Huge steel hooks towe over the belt, with sharp-edged pieces of Machinery dangl from them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look around in horror.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: arge pieces of Machinery, pipes, and ducts dangle from th ceilings. Layers of dust cover everything like eerie blankets. Bundles of wires lie ripped from their moorings

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ools and shards of glass and metal are strewn around the floor, twisted into strange melted shapes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: hey walk through lines of large missiles lined up in rows

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (WHISPERING) Why would it bring him here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They slide down a duct and land   in a pile of debris. Th now see 2, imprisoned in an old   birdcage. In the b.g., CAT BEAST lurks, next to a pile   of what seems like debr broken machinery. The talisman    is on the floor next to Cat Beast. The Cat Beast seems    to be looking for somet in the debris. The Cat Beast's    back is to us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SEQ. 081 - Factory Chase

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 and 5 hurry forward towards 2.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They find 2, seemingly lifeless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (deep regret) I shouldn't have waited...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 stands compassionately, respecting 5's grief.    5 pats shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: t the pat, 2 blinks 2 awake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (WHISPERS) I knew you would come...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 I thought--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 (cutting him off) Shhh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He motions towards the Beast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 and 9 try to pry the bars open. 2 tries to help. They just manage to pry the bars open and get 2 out when--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly a light SHINES above them. They look up and see

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Cat Beast beaming his light from his eye. It GROWLS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The three dolls run away frantically.    The Cat Beast ch after them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 gets cornered but swipes the Beast and manages to escap 9 jumps a heap of debris but stumbles. 5 and 2 pull him u to higher ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: shoots his crossbow at the Cat Beast, shattering his eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 manages to hide in a tube.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 and 5 run away but get stuck at the end of a table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Cat Beast slashes his claw at them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They climb onto another piece of debris, only to encounte the Cat Beast, now in front of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: he Cat Beast slashes a claw out and knocks them over. Cat Beast moves closer and closer. They are doomed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: uddenly there is a strange rhythmic moaning sound.   The Beast turns, distracted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We pan over and see a mysterious creature that seems to b half ragdoll, half bird, with a bird-skull head swinging weapon over its head.   THIS IS 7. 7 releases the weapon- strap of leather with weighted shot at either end. The weapon flies through the air with a low whooshing sound a strikes the Cat Beast, entangling it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 7, 5, and 9 now charge the Cat Beast. 5 shoots his crossb entangling the Beast's paw and hobbling it. 9 and 2 both LURE THE CAT BEAST IN DIFFERENT DIRECTIONS, deliberately goading and further causing it to become entangled in the machinery.   7 now leaps up over the Beast and brings the full weight of her spear down on the Cat Beast's neck. Th head of the Beast comes off and lands at their feet. 7 now pulls off her bird-skull helmet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You weren't lost--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 You've come back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 7 I never left. YOU finally decided to join the fight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: he hands 5's map back to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 comes over with her shield (lost during the fight). looks 9 over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think I know why.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They move towards her but she turns and looks at 9.     2 nod proudly towards 9. 7 nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: hey all look at the fallen Cat Beast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 is poking at it:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 Rusty... hacked together... shoddy pile of scrap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all turn to leave. 5 and 7 support 2 on either side him, helping 2 along.   9 hangs back to look at the machi again, and suddenly sees the TALISMAN, lying on the floor

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5, 7, and 2 have continued on without him and do not see as he picks it up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: looks at the strange object with ENORMOUS CURIOSITY. He turns it and see the RUNES on the side of it. He turns an inspects it closely.   He turns and discovers, on the machine, a PORT with the SAME RUNES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (blurting out) Look!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The others now turn to see him. They see him holding the talisman close to the machine's port... about to experimentally put the talisman INTO the port.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 No!   Stop!       NO!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 tries to break free and stagger towards him but it is t late. 9 puts the talisman into the port.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: othing happens for a moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then suddenly, horribly, the ground begins to SHAKE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SEQ. 082 - Fabrication Machine

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly the Cat Beast's dead body begins to SHIFT and MOVE... There is a rumbling from beneath it as...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... a LARGE FORM rises up from under the debris.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANGLE on the machine awakening: movement under the cloth, claw-like appendage rising from the rubble.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 7 Quickly!   Run!         Get away!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They try to climb to safer ground from the tumbling debri

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: is thrown back and LANDS hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A mechanical ARM emerges and PINS 7, 9, and 5.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As dust and debris rain down, we see one hideous RED EYE begin to come up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: s 2 tries to scramble to safety, the other three ragdolls pinned by the mechanical arm, stare in horror. We see tha the "pile of Machinery" has risen to reassemble into an monstrous, towering FABRICATION MACHINE attached to the ceiling of the building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is enormous, a spherical shape with a dozen folded appendages, each with different fabrication tools at the of its long spindly robotic arms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 tries to crawl away but the Machine grabs him with his robotic arm.

dialogues.speaker: T
dialogues.text: he Machine points the talisman towards 2 and it OPENS up a sparking green glow. 2 struggles in the Machine's claw the strange green energy SHOOTS directly into 2's mouth a eyes, painfully  his soul.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NGLE on 2 as his soul is being taken.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 slumps over, his LIFELESS CARCASS smoking in the grip o the Machine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NGLE on the green glow as it PASSES into the machine. The sound has drawn its attention. The Machine turns towards them and grabs at them with its enormous claw. 9, 5, and turn and flee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Fabrication Machine's arms chase after them. 5 shoots his grappling hook onto a switch. 9 and 7 grab onto him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frantically working together, the three of them manage to escape the Machine's horrifying arms. [  Important to mak sure the Machine is understood to be tethered to the Factory.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They see in the distance a pipe that leads out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the Machine's RED POV, they run into it just as the Machine's arm is behind them but can't fit into the hole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seq. 084 - Going to the library

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9, 5, and 7 escape out a long tube that leads out from th factory and JUMP behind a small trench.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 HEARTBROKEN) My poor old friend...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 7 puts a consoling hand on his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 7 (shaking her head) I know. turning on 9) What? What on earth were you thinking?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 (just as devastated) I didn't know... I'm sorry...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stares in horror at the factory.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What WAS that? What is it doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: hey are interrupted by a loud whirring sound from the machinery inside the factory. They whirl around, then sta at each other, horrified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What will it do now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 shakes his head miserably.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 7 looks at them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She strides off. 9 follows. 5 turns, grieving, towards th factory, head bowed. He hesitates, then goes after 9 and

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SEQ. 090 - The twins

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9, 5, and 7 enter into a building through a hole that has been put in a side wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They enter the ruins of an old library.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Giant stacks of random, tattered, stained books, globes, celestial devices tower over them. Dusty rays of light be down through broken glass skylights, casting filtered lig on shelves and shelves of old tomes, papers, and crumblin artifacts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 stops to look at a beautiful painting, showing life and world before the apocalypse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 (whispering to himself) So beautiful...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 7 grabs the lightstaff from 9 and shines it towards a pil books. A glimmer of two sets of eyes appear and disappear

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 7 holds her hand up, gesturing to 9 to hold still. 3 & 4 emerge from their globe.   5 smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 delighted, relieved) They've been here? The whole time?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The twins venture out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (SURPRISED) Twins?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 7 (to 5 and 9, explaining) They've been hiding here. Lost in the past.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: and 4 approach 9 with curiosity.   They communicate by beaming ideas to each other.   They look at 9, sizing him They beam their ideas to each other excitedly. 9 recoils. puts a reassuring hand on 9.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (EXPLAINING) They're cataloguing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 3 and 4 take 9's lightstaff. Their chattering and beaming gets more intense as they take it and catalogue it, their eyes clicking as if they're recording on film what they a seeing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 7 stops them.   She has an urgent look on her face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need you--we awakened something--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 interrupts her to take full responsibility for the mist

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 I awakened something.   In the factory.   Something terrible...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 3 and 4 look at each other WITH HORROR. They begin to chatter feverishly and with great distress.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: hey beam an image of THE FABRICATION MACHINE on the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 and 9 lean forward, startled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (recognizing it) That's it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 7 What is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 3 and 4 now show:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NEWSPAPER PHOTOGRAPH of the Scientist and the Machine (which we recognize from before, in the prologue, when th Scientist gave the machine to the Dictator and we saw the FLASH of the flashbulb).

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We now push into the photo to a CLOSE UP on the machine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then dissolve into a NEWSREEL of the machine and see:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -the original machine being wired into the FABRICATION
-Dutch-angle shots of the Dictator, and we hear his SPEEC

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...yes, we have entered a new future, the age of the intelligent machine. This remarkable invention can adapt and evolve, creating new machines, machines of (a slight, chilling pause) PEACE---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --shots of the Killing Machines, marching out as they're

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DICTATOR (V.O.) (cont'd) --that will usher in a new era of PROSPERITY--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --shots of the Machines ATTACKING--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --A newspaper headline "HUNDREDS KILLED AT PEACE RALLY"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DICTATOR (V.O.) (cont'd) --and brotherhood for our nation!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, terrible sounds of war:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --A newspaper headline "WAR DECLARED AFTER UNPROVOKED ATT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --STILL PHOTOS showing the war, the machines getting more more devious, chasing a mother and child down an alley, m and more machines appearing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -SHAKY, HAND-HELD AMATEUR footage showing the GAS KILLING EVERYTHING. The footage ends with the camera sinking to t ground as whoever is operating it is overcome by gas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -ending on a STILL PHOTO that we pan across, showing TOTA DEVASTATION.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ragdolls stare at it.    9 turns to them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What have I done?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: shakes her head sadly and impatiently.   5 suddenly turns 9.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: T

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 (TO 9) The thing!       Show them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 quickly sketches out a drawing of the TALISMAN and show to the twins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 3 and 4 chatter, trying to analyze and catalogue the draw of the Talisman. They shake their heads: they don't recognize it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: eeing it as a drawing, 5 is startled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait! 6... he always draws that. used to keep the drawings... with his notes....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 looks at 5.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The drawings... would they still be there? In 2's old workshop?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 Yes. (slightly embarrassed) I saved everything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: hen we'll go back.       Perhaps the answer is there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 looks alarmed and looks over at 7.      7 shakes her he 7

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think the answer is there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She points out towards the factory and strides off, dauntless, fine, and proud. The twins chatter unhappily, beaming flickering lights to each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 looks at 5.    5 nods and they set off in the other direction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SEQ. 120 - Winged Beast creation

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inside the factory, a very quick shot of the Fabrication Machine reaching its arms out and gathering things. It we metal pieces. It grabs an enormous black-and-red Dictator flag and rips it in half.   [  We do not see yet what it creating.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SEQ. 130 - Confrontation

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 and 5 sneak into 2's workshop. A dirty moonlight filter through the air. 9's light is off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: , familiar with the layout, locates 2's stash of 6's drawings. The pages are dotted with 2's annotations and drawings; he was obviously trying to figure out why 6 kep imagining this object and what it meant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: and 9 bend over the drawings. They are unable to see clearly in the murky darkness. 9 looks around warily, the switches on his light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The light now reveals 8 LOOMING IN THE SHADOWS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 8 SEIZES them and escorts them out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1, sitting on his throne, glares in righteous anger as 5 9 stand in front of him. 148 1 You awakened what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gets onto his feet angrily. 6 hunches over one of his sketches, muttering to himself. 149

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You fools! I warned you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 8 is sharpening his knife on the side. 150 8 He warned you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 151 1 Now you've put us all in unimaginable peril. And, may I ask, did you manage to save 2? Of course not! By following this witless folly, you've endangered everything we work for!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 152 9 Why was 2 sent out to begin with?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 153 1 (DEFENSIVELY) I sent him to scout.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 That doesn't make any sense! You don't send the oldest out to-- (trying to control

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, we need to figure out what's going on--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 6 emerges from his shadowy corner and comes over to 9. He has a drawing of the Talisman and seems to want to show i urgently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (softly, trying to tell him of something, but unable to fully articulate it) The source... You must go back to the source....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 (turning to 6) What? What is it?    Where?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 bangs his staff against the floor. 8 stands at attentio

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 Quiet! (TO 9) I won't allow you to endanger us further. (TO 8) Subjugate them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 8 looks confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: S

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (TO 8) Take their belongings!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 8 grabs 6's drawing and lifts 5 from his crossbow and shake him up. 9 tries to stop him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 8 PUNCHES 9 out of the way, knocking him to the edge of t floor. A knocked chess piece FALLS down the dark abyss be them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: slowly gets up and addresses 1. 160 9 ou're nothing but a coward!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: lets out a GASP. 8 heads towards 9 as he laughs and crack his knuckles menacingly. 1 cuts in. 161 1 (suspicious, angry) How dare you challenge me! I, who kept everyone safe all these years. Ever since you got here everything has been unraveling. You're a curse. A fool guided by pointless queries.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 stands staunch. 62 9 (gritting teeth, angry, determined; effort at end as 9 pulls the staff out of 1's hand) A nd you are a blind man guided by fear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 6 holds onto the key around his neck, looking afraid. 163 6 The sky... the sky is breaking....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A shadow comes over them with a faint sound of something outside. 1 starts to back away. 164 1 ometimes fear is the appropriate response.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The WINGED BEAST tail crashes through the stained glass window and breaks into the floor right next to 9.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 6 looks bewildered and doesn't move.   5 pulls him out of danger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 6 (whispering, reflexively) The source... the source...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5, 6, 8 and 9 huddle together. Suddenly the Winged Beast comes crashing in the window behind them, knocking over t thurible and splashing hot coals all over the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SEQ. 140 - Winged Beast Attacks

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5, 6, 8 and 9 see the Winged Beast emerge from the smoke pouring out of the upset thurible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Winged Beast SHRIEKS at them. It catches its foot on runner leading up to 1's empty throne. The hymnboard/ calendar topples away to reveal 1 hiding behind it. 1 instinctively clutches his staff causing the bell at the of the staff to RING and attracting the Winged Beast's attention. 1 flees. 8 charges the Beast but it SCYTHES its wing toward him and knocks 8 across the floor. 8 slides across the fl to 1, who stands next to 6's picture of the Cat Beast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 pushed the picture of the Cat Beast away to reveal a HI PASSAGEWAY. 1 runs away as 8 looks at the others for a br moment before also running away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Winged Beast turns its attention to 9, 5, and 6. The ragdolls run for the bucket and bell-ropes, but 9 trips. Winged Beast advances towards him.   5 reaches out to 9. gestures to him to continue without him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As 9 recovers himself and makes a break for the bucket, 5 starts to lower the bucket down. Just as the Winged Beast about to catch up with him, 9 LEAPS down the shaft and la in the bucket with 5 and 6.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Angrily, the Beast lashes its harpoon tail down at them, piercing the bottom of the bucket. The bucket rocks and 6 sent FLYING OUT but 5 CATCHES him in the nick of time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Winged Beast starts reeling its harpoon tail in. Jerk back and forth, the bucket ascends, drawing the ragdolls closer and closer to the Beast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 spots a SMALL LEDGE next to a stained glass window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He opens the side of the bucket and gestures that they sh jump.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The others hesitate, but then 9, 6, and 5 jump out of the bucket onto a swinging rope, and onto the ledge. The Wing Beast plummets down the shaft after them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ragdolls squeeze through a small crack in the stained glass emerging onto a ledge overlooking the Cathedral's r

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 sees 1 and 8 running across the roof and points to 5 an to look down there. Down on the roof, 1 and 8 see 5, 6, a 9. 1 pushes past 8 and runs farther out, towards the fron of the Cathedral. 8 follows.

dialogues.speaker: S
dialogues.text: uddenly, the Winged Beast SMASHES through the glass behin them. It struggles to get through the window but can't qu fit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 6 is very vulnerable out there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 turns to 5.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 Take him inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: now climbs out on the gargoyle purposefully.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Winged Beast FLIES UP into the air, circling lazily. and 8, running on the top of the roof, are very exposed. Hawklike, the Winged Beast sails towards them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 8 steps up to defend 1. He flips his salt-shaker helmet d over his face as armor, pulls out his scissor knife and stands his ground... waiting... waiting for the Winged Be to soar in closer...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then, at the last possible moment, he HURLS his sciss knife at the Winged Beast. It flies through the air and catches in the Beast's propeller.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Knocked off balance, the Beast swoops down. 1 ducks out o the way but it knocks 8 off his feet. 8 slides down the sloped edge of the roof, towards GAPING HOLE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just as 8 is about to fall into the hole, he catches on t the edge. His other blade plummets through the hole as he hangs, desperately... his grip SLIPPING...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 catches up to where 1 is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 6 and 5 run down the banisters towards the crashed plane. seems to pull 5 in a particular direction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Winged Beast circles around and sets its harpoon tail shoot. 1 squints into the sun as the Winged Beast, backli swoops down towards them. He sees a glare come from the t roof. 9 gets an idea.    He gestures to 1 to help him. 1 scowls, but has no alternative but to help him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 peels back a piece of the roof, with 1 helping him.   T

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: beams right into the eyes of the Winged Beast, momentaril blinding it.

dialogues.speaker: T
dialogues.text: he Beast flinches just as it FIRES its harpoon tail at th Blinded by the glare, it MISSES and almost hits 8.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The harpoon imbeds itself into a rafter inside the Cathed

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SEQ. 145 - Wing

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 8 falls onto and then slides down the harpoon's line, swinging into the Cathedral and landing on the wing of th airplane embedded in the side of the Cathedral, right nex 5 and 6. 8's weight on the harpoon's line has pulled it m and more taut...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Winged Beast is pulled hard into the roof and slides down, knocking into 1 and 9.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 and 9 PLUNGE into the Cathedral and onto the plane wing where 8 catches them in midair before they hit the wing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: <

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Winged Beast plummets after them onto the wing. It pi itself up, spots the cowering ragdolls, and opens up his bladed beak screaming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Winged Beast starts to charge them when suddenly--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 7 DROPS DOWN from a high parapet and leaps onto the Winge Beast's neck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: and 8 stare in surprise.   9 stares in delight and relief

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (stunned and surprised) 7?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: mmediately, the beast throws her off towards the others. She'd dropped her spear; she goes to pick it up and

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PFFFFFFT> immediately, her leg is IMPALED by the Winge Beast, which has fired its harpoon. She is impaled next t the guys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 7 (LIGHTLY) I thought you might need some help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But as she speaks, the Beast begins to reel her in. fights viciously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: jumps and grabs on to 7 as she's being pulled away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (YELLING) My spear!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: grabs her forked spear and hands it to her. She grabs her forked spear and stabs it into the plane.   The harpoon's cable is pulled taut 9 between her leg and the Winged Beast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (yelling to the others) The cable! Cut it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 8 runs to recover the blade that slipped from his grasp a slid down the roof, then runs over and SLICES with all hi brute force through the cable. The cable flies up in the and WRAPS itself around the propeller on the end of the w

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Winged Beast jerks back, towards the propeller, causi the whole wing of the plane to tilt, and the ragdolls to slide. 5 and 6 tumble into the plane's engine room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 7 clutches her staff. 9 slides by her and grabs on to the harpoon, still lodged in her leg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9's staff slides by, and 9 catches it just before it fall off the wing. As 8 climbs up onto the same buttress fragm that 7's spear is lodged in, 1 slides down the wing, past 179

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to 1; holding out his STAFF) Grab on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 grabs 9's staff. Dangling, he sees that the Winged Beas is close behind, snapping at him with its beak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 sees 5 and 6 in the engine room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shouting to 5) The propeller! Start the propeller!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 6 nods. 5 points to the wires. 5 and 6 gather wires and s to work. They ZAP the propeller to life and it GROANS... whines into motion as it starts taking up the power it ha generated. It goes faster... faster...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Even as the Beast is slowly drawn towards the propeller, struggles forward and grabs 1's cape in its beak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the Winged Beast pulls 1 closer, 9 strains to hang on 1, and 7 strains with the added weight on the harpoon sticking out of her wounded leg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 My... my cape!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 Let it go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 glares furiously, hesitates, then undoes the clasp. The Winged Beast falls backwards down the wing, DIRECTLY INTO DEADLY BLADES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is instantly shredded.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Claws, feathers, and strange mechanical debris shower dow

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: , 9, and 7 look in relief as the Beast is finally destroy

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: fter the clasp is released, 1 has meanwhile recoiled into 9's arms. There is a brief moment of awkwardness as 1 and realize how close they are physically to each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 begins to climb up the side of the wing, using dangling and 7 as a ladder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perched on top of 7's staff, 1 reaches up for 8, who is crouched on the edge of the buttress. He grabs 8's hand, gesturing imperiously to 8 to pull him up. 9 looks at 7 urgently, nodding to her. She gets it immediately and grabs 1's leg, stopping him. 86 1 You fool! We can still save ourselves!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The plane teeters down to a 90 degree angle. 5 and 6 look at the rest of the ragdolls from farther down the wing. 5 concerned and almost panicked. 6 is almost zen-peaceful, though he can foresee it will be all right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: looks around and sees the rope tied around 7's waist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (TO 7) Your rope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 7 throws it down to 9 who ties it to his own waist. The p tilts... it's hanging even more precariously now... about fall out of the side of the Cathedral entirely...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 suddenly jumps down into the flames just as the plane starts to fall. 7 shouts with stress.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The plane EXPLODES as it hits the ground, smoke rising fr the crash. The rope pulls taut, and after the smoke settl we can see 9 dangling with 5 and 6.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 8 pulls the hanging chain of ragdolls up and onto the buttress fragment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: s 1 recovers himself and straightens his hat, he glances up... towards the smouldering clock tower...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seq. 155 - Sanctuary lost

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can see, in the distance, the Cathedral, on fire.
