dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ragdolls have come to the library. Embers from the burning cathedral drift down like burning snowflakes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (BROKEN-HEARTED) Oh... my sanctuary...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The others try to avoid the embers. 9 moves purposefully towards the library. 1 stands, mourning his sanctuary. Hi staff is charred and ruined. He lets it drop. 8 takes 1's arm and urges him to follow the others.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seq. 157 - Seamstress being constructed

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inside the factory, a shot of the Fabrication Machine reaching its arms out and gathering remnants and detritus that we will see later as part of the SEAMSTRESS. [The Machine is clearly tethered to the Factory.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ne of the machine's arms discovers 2's body.    The arm s horribly interested.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seq. 160 - Library

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: , 5, 1, 8, and 6 have come to a clearing in the debris outside the globe. 6 has dropped to the floor and is draw his pattern. 1 looks angrily up at the glass ceilings. 1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: t's not safe here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: shakes his head, agreeing with his boss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 8 No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 to 8, keeping his sense of responsibility) Stand lookout.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 points out into the gardens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll search out a safer retreat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: moves away, looking for what he might find in the way of safer retreat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 8, proud to receive orders, strides off towards the garde taking care to STEP ONTO 6's DRAWING and smear it. He lau meanly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: shakes his head sadly and takes another piece of parchmen to start over. He is drawing the talisman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looking up at the sky; to 7) There will be more, won't there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 7 nods grimly.       9 looks worriedly after 1's retreati

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: looking after 1's retreating form) Forget him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The twins appear in the crack of the globe. They flash th eyes and gesture for 9 to come in. 9 moves away into the globe. 6 sees the twins and, happily, skitters towards th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: and 7 are left alone.    5 works deftly on 7's leg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 QUIETLY) You wanted us to forget you, too?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (QUIETLY) Why did you leave us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: looks around, trying to find the right words.    Finally:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 7 I couldn't sit and hide, just waiting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (APOLOGETICALLY) I just couldn't. It's... (contrite, trying to explain herself to her FRIEND) It's not in my nature.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 nods, smiling ruefully.     He knows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: smiles and nods, almost shyly. He's finished fixing her leg. She flexes it and smiles at him.   Now she looks around, worriedly, sensing something.

dialogues.text: FLASH of something slithering.

dialogues.text: A FLASH again of something slithering closer.     Somethi menacing.

dialogues.text: Seq. 164 - Confrontation

dialogues.speaker: C
dialogues.text: LOSE on a DRAWING OF the TALISMAN'S RUNES in ancient illuminated manuscript. Pull back to see the twins have found this and are showing it to 9. 5 and 6 crowd around. is clutching his drawing of the talisman.

dialogues.text: 7 looks out of the globe, intuitively startled, her scout sense unhappy. She senses something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 looks at her, but also now studies the drawings and the writings around them that explain them.   He studies the drawings of the RUNES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 studying the drawings, CAREFULLY) An alchemist's ability to draw animus into the unanimated...

dialogues.text: He turns the page and sees a drawing of the Talisman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Again!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gazes at the picture as though drawn to it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it? What can it be?

dialogues.text: 6 (trying to help) The source...!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 6 (helplessly trying to articulate something) The first room--

dialogues.text: 1 now appears out of the darkness.   He sees the manuscri and the drawings of the runes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (ANGRILY) Dark science.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We whip pan over and see 1 standing in the entrance to th globe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 (ANGRILY) What good does this useless rubbish do us? Forget it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He seems unusually agitated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 moves towards him, curiously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: hat do you know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: e comes closer to 1.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (WHISPERING) The source... the source...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 turns and meets 9's gaze unflinchingly. We have a momen of admiration for the old soldier's toughness. But he spe now with a strange bitterness. He gestures around at the library, at the ruins of humanity's civilization.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 (BITTERLY) I know enough to leave their ancient evils to moulder. Look what they have left us with. Leave it be, I say! (ANGRILY) But you. Always asking questions, so many pointless questions-- probing, pushing-- spitting out the words, beginning to rant and rave a little) like 2--he always had to know--too MUCH--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 (SUDDENLY) I was right! You did send him out to die!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 He was old!   He was weak!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 suddenly realizes what he's said.      He collects hims stands tall, defending himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sometimes one must be sacrificed for the good of many.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LEAPS angrily at 1, pulling her blade to 1's neck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 7 Coward!

dialogues.text: Her blade flashes at 1's neck.    9 leaps forward and blo her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 Stop!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (IMPLORING) We must work together. We must use our thoughts, not our weapons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 moves back towards the drawing of the Talisman and look down at it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The answer to all our questions is here, in some way. I can feel it. We must follow this path...

dialogues.text: 1 glares furiously at all of them, then turns to address

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 Your path takes us to catastrophe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: e strides away.

dialogues.text: 1 picks his way through the stacks, ranting to himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 an't he see his way only brings trouble? What good comes from his path? I know what we need. I know what is right--

dialogues.text: Suddenly, he hears a sound. The twisted corpse of 2 comes floating out from the stacks like Banquo's ghost. 1 stops rigid with terror.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (MOANING) No....

dialogues.text: 2's eyes click on with their hypnotic gaze.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1's SCREAM echoes through the library.    The others rush of the globe.

dialogues.text: They race towards 1, into an area of the library with a l broken FOUNTAIN. The fountain is sunken into the library floor (with statuary reaching up into the library).

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: hey now see, to their horror--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A hideous SERPENT-LIKE CREATURE with NEEDLE-LIKE CLAWS an HORRIFYING VACANT FACELESS HOOD.

dialogues.text: The Seamstress has sewed the carcass of "2" into her tail order to lure and mesmerize the ragdolls. She emits a GLOWING LIGHT through 2's vacant eye sockets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She RISES UP and points her sewing needles at 1... we see limp body trapped in her belly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The other ragdolls leap into action.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: chops off the tail and with it 2's carcass but then is thrown to the side and trapped as a cascade of books fall her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 manages to grab 1 who is partially sewn on to the seamstress but can't free him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The seamstress lashes out towards them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 fires an arrow and hits the Seamstress's eye, blinding She turns to flee, dragging 1 with her. 1 struggles in mortal terror.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 pulls the blade from 2's staff from his quiver and thro it to 9. 9 catches the blade and cuts the threads away fr 1's body, trying to free him unsuccessfully as 1 struggle

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: t the very last moment, they manage TO CUT 1 LOOSE. But t seamstress suddenly darts one of her claws out, GRABS 7, SLITHERS OFF out through the library [ALT: through part o drainpipe in the bottom of the fountain] with 8 still attached to her belly and disappears.

dialogues.speaker: T
dialogues.text: he other ragdolls run after her but it is futile; she is gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 (HORRIFIED) No! No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ragdolls stand in the bottom of the fountain, where remnants of water still linger, and water dribbles into t drainpipe at the bottom of the fountain [ALT: next to the fountain]. The coin in 1's crown falls to the ground. He sits down heavily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The twins emerge, eyes wide. They've seen the whole thing They look with alarm at everyone, and sadly, at 2's carca

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: looks in the direction of where the seamstress disappeare

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 I have to get her back!   I have to go after her!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 It's too late.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: e has a strange, sad look on his face.    He looks in the direction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (SADLY) It killed 8... it'll kill her too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It didn't kill him. (THINKING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's taking (cont'd) to the 9 them back Machine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The twins look up and nod their agreement. While the othe have been talking, they have found a book cover and have 2's body on it. They now put the sword on top of 2 like a fallen soldier and put his hands on his chest holding the sword.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (URGENTLY) We have to go--all of us.   We have to rescue them--

dialogues.text: 5 (nodding soberly) --and destroy the machine for once and for all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: just bows his head.    He's still mourning 8.   9 gives h compassionate look.

dialogues.text: They turn towards the twins, and see them pick up 1's coi and place it on top of 2's face. They see that the twins have prepared 2's body for burial.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: hey all bow their heads. The twins now slowly send 2 floating down the remnants of water in the drainpipe at t bottom of the fountain.

dialogues.text: 5 pulls out the piece of burlap from 2's back with his nu on it. He hands it to 9.

dialogues.text: looks at 5, 9, and the twins soberly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look at him.    Slowly, they nod, as though acceptin their mission.

dialogues.text: A SHOT of the tallest smokestack.    It belches smoke, darkening the dusk sky.

dialogues.text: looks out past the pumping derricks and sees AN ENTRANCE A COAL CHUTE.

dialogues.text: EXACTLY as we planned.

dialogues.text: he others nod.     9 turns to 5.

dialogues.text: Take charge.

dialogues.text: scowls.   5 nods, proudly taking the responsibility.

dialogues.text: darts purposefully towards the factory.

dialogues.text: We gestures to the others. e see the barrel is on top of a small hill that leads dow to coal car tracks. The tracks lead to the open mouth of coal chute that feeds into the factory.

dialogues.text: With confidence now, he looks around. He sees a splintere pile of wood planks, the remains of a wooden derrick platform. He looks at the others and gestures to the wood

dialogues.text: He spots the half-blinded Seamstress and watches in HORRO he sees that the Seamstress is giving 8 up to the Fabrica Machine. 9 is too late to do anything to stop the Machine from sucking 8's soul.

dialogues.text: NGLE on 9 as he realizes she is still alive and he can st rescue her! From his hiding place he looks around for a w to rescue her. He inspects the machinery near him. He see a LEVER and GEARS. He looks at his LIGHTSTAFF. He then spots a remnant of the FABRIC used to create the Winged Beast. We see he is formulating a plan. He darts his hand out to drag the fabric towards him.

dialogues.text: NGLE on the Fabrication Machine as it begins to power bac up after taking 8's soul.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly the Seamstress hears a SOUND.   She whips around

dialogues.text: OV through the Seamstress's damaged eye: a MOVEMENT in th shadows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: he Seamstress, distracted from her morbid mission with 7, slithers towards the movement.

dialogues.text: In the shadow we see a RAGDOLL with GLOWING EYES. 7 sees this and registers recognition, relief, and also TERROR a what will be 9's fate. But she is unable to move or speak and now, just as 9 could only watch 8's soul being sucked out, 7 can only helplessly watch as the Seamstress slithe closer and closer to its prey. We see the misery on 7's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The seamstress raises her needles and STRIKES the ragdoll sewing wildly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ragdoll SWINGS OUT from a string attached to a lever. The lever now moves down (because of the weight of the ragdoll) and SWITCHES on machinery. Gears start to turn a we see the ragdoll is attached and begins to drag the tra seamstress in, arms first.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: he gears CRUNCH the ragdoll. 7 FLINCHES... but then her expression turns to amazement as she suddenly sees it is a ragdoll at all but is 9'S LIGHT-STAFF DRESSED IN FABRIC Instinctively, she looks up, a sudden hopeful look on her face... just as

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 SWINGS IN and lands on the SEAMSTRESS, tearing a hole i her back. He slides down the length of her body, FREEING

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: 5 (hoarse whisper) PULL!

dialogues.text: They all pull down with all their weight. The barrel lift and teeters, then tips and RACES DOWN THE HILL. At the bottom, it launches off the boards, spinning into the air landing on the rails to the coal chute with a sparking cr

dialogues.text: he ragdolls race down after it.

dialogues.text: The barrel rolls and comes to a stop right at the mouth o the coal chute. .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: W

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5, always looking around warily for the seeker drones, directs 1, 6, and the twins to conceal themselves behind barrel. He anxiously stares down the tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 here are they?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The twins' eyes flicker anxiously.      1 looks down the as well.

dialogues.text: It's been too long.    We should take action.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: hesitates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you forgetting what he said? If he doesn't return--continue as planned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: hesitates.   He peers down into the darkened tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EXACTLY as planned!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He grabs a sharp piece of metal and stabs the side of the barrel. He stuffs an old rag into the hole and grabs a ma out of 5's quiver.

dialogues.text: 5 (SHOUTING) No--stop!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Immediately a beam of bright light focuses down on them. They look up and see one of the horrible SEEKER DRONES floating directly above them.

dialogues.text: Its two slug-like eyes reel in recognition.     The wail air raid siren pierces the still night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 (TO 5) Fool!

dialogues.text: 9 and 7 sneak towards the coal chute escape.     They hea SIREN go off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: and 9 race desperately towards the coal chute escape with the Spider Beasts crawling and spinning after them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 instinctively fires his grappling hook at the Drone. and the twins try to drag the Drone down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: brandishes the match. We suddenly hear the sound of the SPIDERS. 1 looks down the tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FIERCELY) More creatures!      We have to ACT! NOW!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 strikes the match on the side of the oil barrel and is about to light the rag. 5 grabs his arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 No!    Not yet--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They tussle over the lighted match when suddenly--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did I tell you?      Light it! Now!

dialogues.text: 7 and 9 run towards them. The eyes of the spiders can be seen right behind them. 1 looks at the burning match in h hands, thinking about what he almost did...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 (CONFIDENT) Now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 sets the rag on fire. The ragdolls jump behind the barr and PUSH it into the tunnel. 7 and 9 just make it, leapin out of the tunnel as the flaming barrel HURTLES down the tunnel--DRAGGING the SEEKER DRONE with it--crunching over unseen Beasts--and landing in the factory and --

dialogues.text: he dolls run from the blast.    9 and 7 look on in triump

dialogues.text: The ragdolls walk up to the hill away from the explosions 6, and the twins pick up old debris along the way and stu it.

dialogues.speaker: T
dialogues.text: he group turns and watches the factory as it burns to the ground. 311 5 (TO 9) It's done.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The past is dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: turns to 9, her face full of gratitude.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 7 And some of us very much alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 comes up behind them. He looks deep in thought.     He catches his hat as it begins to slip off his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 goes to sit down and rest, sitting on a brick. 5 heads over towards the others. But 9, seeing 1's contemplative mood, stops next to 1. 1 looks up at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 REGRETFULLY) I've been a bitter old pill, haven't I?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 looks at 1, not sure how to respond. 1 now also sees 2' old staff that 9 is still holding onto.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks over at 9.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I lost sight... of many things.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: e looks at 9 as though to beg his forgiveness.    9 sits next to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've both made mistakes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: e looks over at the smoldering remains of the factory.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's past is past.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look at each other for a beat, then look over to the others, relaxing together on the Victrola.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: holds out his hand to 1. 1 gives 9 his hand and 9 helps him up. As 1 stands, his heavy headpiece falls off and shatters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: looks in horror.    But 1 just looks at it, shrugging and slightly smiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 It was always so heavy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 smiles.

dialogues.speaker: H
dialogues.text: e now runs his hand over his head, which we now see has a funny looking pony-tail like protuberance.   9 hesitates, then can't help CHUCKLING. 1 sees him, then starts to LAU as well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 and 1 go over together to the Victrola. 7 notices as 9 helps 1 climb up on the Victrola and starts to celebrate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 joins 7 near the needle and 6 sits on the crank as it s around. Everyone is enjoying the music.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 discovers a trove of records (enormous in scale compare the little ragdoll). He curiously begins to go through th

dialogues.text: He picks one out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But it rolls away from him.  It rolls towards the hill an then down the hill. 5 runs after it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind him, unseen by anyone, the talisman crackles and g slightly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: notices.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 sees 6's beginning panic and whirls to see --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 running down the hillside.       And suddenly--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --the enormous Fabrication Machine, RISES UP, free of the factory, TOWERING over him like a giant monster.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE TALISMAN is GLOWING ferociously in the Machine's fron

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NO!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He tries to run towards 5.       5 SHRIEKS, running back the others.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 5 Run!   Run!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The other ragdolls whirl and stare, frozen, at the hideou apparition...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: G

dialogues.text: 9 tries to run towards the Machine. 1 pulls him away frantically, fiercely forcing 9 to allow himself to be sa

dialogues.text: 1 (TO 9) There's nothing you can do!

dialogues.text: 5 faces the Machine as the green of the TALISMAN shoots o at him, sucking his soul into its portal. The Machine's e turns green showing it has absorbed the soul, then back t glowing red. 333 9 No!   No!

dialogues.text: The Machine again SHAKES and then seems momentarily paral as it ingests the soul, giving the ragdolls a moment to f scrambling, desperately trying to get up the hill and esc 1 looks over to the bridge. His general's instincts kick back in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1 Follow me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: SEQ. 201
dialogues.text: 335 9 o!   Get across!

dialogues.text: 9 sends 1 and the twins across the bridge. He turns to 7 they don't need to speak--they both understand the plan. They linger behind, luring the Machine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The twins chatter. 6 is moving slower than the others. grabs his arm and pulls him off the bridge. 338 1 Come on, we can't stay here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: N
